pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Soccer SDK UtilsThis package contains general purpose utilities to be utilized in various other Soccer related SDK products.# Setup- Create your virtual environment of choice- Install Poetry globallyInstall dependencies```bash$ pip install --upgrade pip $ pip install -r requirements-dev.txt$ invoke install```Update dependencies```bash$ invoke update```Clean up transient files```bash$ invoke clean```Analyze syntax```bash$ invoke lint```Run tests```bash$ invoke test```Generate Coverage Report```bash$ invoke cover```Build the project```bash$ invoke build```The default task is build so by calling invoke you will build the project```bash$ invoke```
